name: project-geeenesis
description: A NTU EEE project to improve freshman transition into University life | Prawira Genestonlia | All rights reserved

scripts.start: npm run start:admin & npm run start:user
scripts.build: npm run build-client && npm run build-client-mentors && npm run build-client-students
scripts.install: npm run install:admin & npm run install:user &npm run install:server
scripts.git-fast-sync: git add . && git commit -m "Fast Sync" && git push origin master
